ValidationRule.description: Cannot edit Outbound Call record types
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "RTL_Retail_Outbound_Phone_Call", OR($Profile.Name <> "Retail Integration API Only", CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Admin")), OR( ISCHANGED( Status ), ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), ISCHANGED( Priority ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorised to make changes to this task.
